channel.title: I need help please please please help!
channel.description: i need help making a anger rack so when u click it it would give u a anger wep please help!!

item.title: I need help please please please help!
item.dc:creator: @deathbyu deathbyu
item.description:
@deathbyu wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:14, topic:343829”]He said he wanted a choice. Not a random item.
Declare this method.

public void pickAngerWeapon() { changeText126("What do you want?", 2481);// = Select an Option changeText126("Anger Spear", 2482);// = option1 changeText126("Anger Sword", 2483);// = option2 changeText126("Anger Mace", 2484);// = option3 changeText126("Anger Battleaxe", 2485); sendFrame164(2480); }

Than in case 132 add

if (objectID == ###) { pickAngerWeapon(); }

Than in ClickingMost.java add these new cases.

[code=Java] case 9178: // Anger Spear
c.addItem(AngerSwordID, 1);
c.sM(“You take a spear from the rack.”);
c.closeInterface();
break;

    case 9179: // Anger Sword
           c.addItem(AngerSwordID, 1);
           c.sM("You take a swordf rom the rack.");
           c.closeInterface();
    break;

    case 9180: // Anger Mace
           c.addItem(AngerMaceID, 1);
           c.sM("You take a mace from the rack.");
           c.closeInterface();
    break;

    case 9181: // Anger BattleAxe
           c.addItem(AngerBattleaxeID, 1);
           c.sM("You take a battle axe from the rack.");
           c.closeInterface();
    break;[/code]

You will need to edit the item id in ClickingMost, as well as the object id in Client.[/quote]

i got 4 errors and i cant fix the older error!!! please sombody help btw the errors are

Read full topic
item.source: I need help please please please help!

item.title: I need help please please please help!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

He said he wanted a choice. Not a random item.
Declare this method.

public void pickAngerWeapon() { changeText126("What do you want?", 2481);// = Select an Option changeText126("Anger Spear", 2482);// = option1 changeText126("Anger Sword", 2483);// = option2 changeText126("Anger Mace", 2484);// = option3 changeText126("Anger Battleaxe", 2485); sendFrame164(2480); }

Than in case 132 add

if (objectID == ###) { pickAngerWeapon(); }

Than in ClickingMost.java add these new cases.

[code=Java] case 9178: // Anger Spear
c.addItem(AngerSwordID, 1);
c.sM(“You take a spear from the rack.”);
c.closeInterface();
break;

    case 9179: // Anger Sword
           c.addItem(AngerSwordID, 1);
           c.sM("You take a swordf rom the rack.");
           c.closeInterface();
    break;

    case 9180: // Anger Mace
           c.addItem(AngerMaceID, 1);
           c.sM("You take a mace from the rack.");
           c.closeInterface();
    break;

    case 9181: // Anger BattleAxe
           c.addItem(AngerBattleaxeID, 1);
           c.sM("You take a battle axe from the rack.");
           c.closeInterface();
    break;[/code]

You will need to edit the item id in ClickingMost, as well as the object id in Client.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help please please please help!

item.title: I need help please please please help!
item.dc:creator: @deathbyu deathbyu
item.description:
@deathbyu wrote:

[quote=“deathbyu, post:7, topic:343829”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=440218.msg3234976#msg3234976 date=1276394422]
Can’t be asked to complete it the way you want, at the moment…
Completing a model pack + fixing Hyperion…
Here’s the randomized way… (Did earlier for something else, only chnged a few IDs for you)

[center][b][hr][size=18pt][b][color=red]THE CODE[/size]
[hr]
[size=11pt][color=purple][b]First off, open “item.java” and search for “crackers”

You should find this:[/size]
[/center] public static int crackers[] = { 1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048 }; [center]
[size=11pt][color=purple][b]Or something similar.

Add this right under it:[/size][/center] public static int AngerWeps[] = { 7806, 7808, 7808, 7809, };[center]

[size=11pt][color=purple][b]Also in Item.java, near the bottom you should see:[/size]
[/center] public static int randomPHat() { return crackers[(int) (Math.random() * crackers.length)]; } [center]
[size=11pt][color=purple][b]
Add this under that:[/size]
[/center] public static int randomAngerWep() { return AngerWeps[(int) (Math.random() * AngerWeps.length)]; } [center]
[size=11pt][color=purple][b]
Now save, and open Client.java, and go to your clicked on object void.
(server.clickOnObject)
Should be under case 132.

Now add this to the method:
[/size]
[/center] if (objectID == OBJECT ID) { sM("You search the Anger Rack.."); addItem(Item.randomAngerWep, 1); sM("You found an" + getItemName(id) + "!"); }
[hr]
[center][size=11pt][color=red][b]If you recieve any errors, post them here and I’ll fix them.
[hr]
[size=11pt][color=blue][b]Hope this works, -Tom.[/size][/center]

[/quote]

do u kno how to make it so they could pick what weppon they wanted???[/quote]

another thing is i cant find the server.clickOnObject i looked under case 132 and yes i did look in client.java… please please help…

Read full topic
item.source: I need help please please please help!

hey well can u help me on 1 thing? i got 1 error and its pointing to the dot in
addItem(Item.randomAngerWep, 1);
^

and i need help fixing it here is how it looks with the code above it and under it

if (debug || (playerRights > 1)) {
println("serverobjs size " + server.objects.size());
println_debug("atObject: " + objectX + “,” + objectY
+ " objectID: " + objectID); // 147 might be id for
// object state changing
}
if (objectID == 13995) {
sM(“You search the Anger Rack…”);
addItem(Item.randomAngerWep, 1);
sM(“You found an” + getItemName(id) + “!”);
}
int xDiff = Math.abs(absX - objectX);
int yDiff = Math.abs(absY - objectY);
boolean found = false;
resetAction(false);
TurnPlayerTo(objectX, objectY);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
long time2 = System.currentTimeMillis();
if (time2 - globalCooldown[0] <= 50) {
sM(“Action throttled… please wait longer before acting!”);
break;
}

item.description:
@deathbyu wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Can’t be asked to complete it the way you want, at the moment…
Completing a model pack + fixing Hyperion…
Here’s the randomized way… (Did earlier for something else, only chnged a few IDs for you)

[quote]
[center][b][hr][size=18pt][b][color=red]THE CODE[/size]
[hr]
[size=11pt][color=purple][b]First off, open “item.java” and search for “crackers”

You should find this:[/size]
[/center] public static int crackers[] = { 1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048 }; [center]
[size=11pt][color=purple][b]Or something similar.

Add this right under it:[/size][/center] public static int AngerWeps[] = { 7806, 7808, 7808, 7809, };[center]

[size=11pt][color=purple][b]Also in Item.java, near the bottom you should see:[/size]
[/center] public static int randomPHat() { return crackers[(int) (Math.random() * crackers.length)]; } [center]
[size=11pt][color=purple][b]
Add this under that:[/size]
[/center] public static int randomAngerWep() { return AngerWeps[(int) (Math.random() * AngerWeps.length)]; } [center]
[size=11pt][color=purple][b]
Now save, and open Client.java, and go to your clicked on object void.
(server.clickOnObject)
Should be under case 132.

Now add this to the method:
[/size]
[/center] if (objectID == OBJECT ID) { sM("You search the Anger Rack.."); addItem(Item.randomAngerWep, 1); sM("You found an" + getItemName(id) + "!"); }
[hr]
[center][size=11pt][color=red][b]If you recieve any errors, post them here and I’ll fix them.

item.title: I need help please please please help!
item.dc:creator: @deathbyu deathbyu
item.description:
@deathbyu wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Well, to make it ‘open and give you a list’
You’d have to add an interface.

I can make it where"

[ul][li]It gives you a list of each item in the chatbox (‘Click here for ItemName’)[/li]
[li]You click the rack and you get one of the Anger Weapons. (Randomly)[/li]
[li]You click it and only get one item. (No matter how many times you click it)[/li][/ul]

Or

[ul][li]You click it and get all four anger weapons[/li][/ul][/quote]

i want it to be a listin the chat box… and i want only 3 items in it not 4, only 3 because i want the last 1 rare… btw idk wich item is not included…

Or only give you one anger weapon?
Or give all four?[/quote]
